r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with Redis
r.d: This extension provides an API for communicating with Redis servers.

phpredis 6.0.2
This release contains fixes for OBJECT, PSUBSCRIBE and SCAN commands. You can find a detailed list of changes in CHANGELOG.md and package.xml or by inspecting the git commit logs.
* Fix deprecation error when passing null to match_type parameter.[b835aaa3] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Fix flaky test and OBJECT in a pipeline. [a7f51f70] (Michael Grunder) * Find our callback by pattern with PSUBSCRIBE [2f276dcd] (Michael Grunder)
